item.description:
@hiphop03199 wrote:

why not just make it so when a player uses an object with the npc, npc gives cash. then you could work on the coding done from smithing codes (which already exist) but just change the bars to a certificate and instead of having an anvil replace with an npc.

item.title: Help

item.description:
